title: Nucleus插件的权限问题
author: 邱景涛
txt_content:
我想给某个玩家使用他tp的权限 但是我找不到tp的权限
有没有大佬知道告诉一下

replies.author: Ayamuta
replies.txt_content: /lp user 玩家ID permission add nucleus.teleport.tpa.force

replies.author: 我是dalao
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-727722-1-1.html
nucleus插件的所有权限节点都在里面

replies.author: 邱景涛
replies.txt_content:
我是dalao 发表于 2018-6-15 08:42
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-727722-1-1.html
nucleus插件的所有权限节点都在里面
并没有tp权限

replies.author: z97615669
replies.txt_content:
输入：/lp user xxxx permission set nucleus.teleport.tpa.force
即可解决问题
